actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide an annual clothing allowance to certain veterans who, because of a service-connected disability, wear a prosthetic appliance or appliances which tend to wear out or tear their clothing.

summary.text: Authorizes an annual clothing allowance to specified veterans who, because of a service-connected disability, wear a prosthetic appliance or appliances which tend to wear out or tear their clothing. Limits such allowance to $300. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 362).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide an annual clothing allowance to certain veterans who, because of a service-connected disability, wear a prosthetic appliance or appliances which tend to wear out or tear their clothing.
